title:
Global analysis of Sivers and Collins asymmetries within the TMD
  factorization
authors:
Chunhua Zeng and Hongxin Dong and Tianbo Liue and Peng Sun and Yuxiang
  Zhao
abstract:
We present a global analysis of Sivers functions, transversity distribution
functions, and Collins fragmentation functions within the transverse momentum
dependent factorization. This analysis encompasses the latest data from
semi-inclusive deep inelastic scattering, Drell-Yan, and W/Z-boson production
processes as recently reported by the COMPASS and STAR Collaborations. Upon
integrating the new data into our fitting, the precision of the extracted d and
dbar quark Sivers and transversity distributions, as well as the tensor charge,
is notably improved.
